data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ishikawa, Tadashi, Naka, Takeru (2016): First record of the thread-legged assassin bug genus Proguithera from Japan, with description of a new species (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae). Zootaxa 4184 (1): 184-192, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4184.1.12|3 occurrences
